meanings.definition: A unit of electrical resistance equal to one millionth of an ohm.
meanings.sent1: The circuit had a resistance of only a few microhms, allowing the current to flow easily.
meanings.sent2: The multimeter displayed a reading of 5 microhms, indicating a very low resistance.
meanings.sent3: When the tiny robot tried to measure its own resistance in microhms, it got confused and started dancing.
meanings.sent4: The thin wire's resistance was so low, it was like trying to measure the strength of a whisper in microhms.
meanings.sent5: The concept of microhms can be visualized as a tiny barrier that electricity effortlessly overcomes.
